name: slenderly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a thin and delicate way that is often attractive: She gazed at the slenderly flickering flame of the candle.slenderly built He was slightly taller than she was, and was slenderly built.
formal in a way that is small in amount or degree: The narrative uses half a dozen slenderly linked stories to tell the tale. She was only slenderly familiar with his work.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was dark-haired and slenderly handsome.In the field, a rather slenderly constructed platform was erected.He left the town only slenderly guarded in his absence.
